content:
Samsung’s Galaxy Book 2 Pro series includes some of the thinnest and lightest laptops on the market. Indeed, on the 13-inch clamshell, it weighs in at under two pounds. description: Samsung's Galaxy Book 2 Pro 360 15 is in the house. Here's what the Korean firm bundles with its new convertible laptop.
